OperatorProductionInput.title: Operator Production Input
OperatorProductionInput.description: Represents a single production entry from an operator.

machineId.description: The ID of the machine used.

productionTimeSeconds.description: The time taken for production in seconds.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp of the entry (milliseconds since epoch).

formsNumber.description: Optional forms number associated with the production.

factory.description: The factory where the production took place.

status.description: The current status of the production entry.

ProductionLossInput.title: Production Loss Input
ProductionLossInput.description: Represents a single entry for production loss.

operatorId.description: The ID of the operator reporting the loss.

factory.description: The factory where the loss occurred.

machineId.description: The ID of the machine related to the loss.

reason.description: The reason for the production loss.

timeLostMinutes.description: The downtime in minutes due to the loss.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp of the loss entry (milliseconds since epoch).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.
